short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects and blurs cyberbullying content on X (formerly known as Twitter).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CyberSafe is a Chrome extension designed to make your experience on X (formerly Twitter) safer and more enjoyable. It identifies and blurs tweets that may contain cyberbullying, allowing you to choose whether or not to view them.

Features:
• Automatic Detection: Utilizes advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze tweets in real-time for potential cyberbullying.
• Content Blurring: Automatically blurs identified tweets, displaying a warning message instead of the content.
• User Control: Easily enable or disable the blurring feature through the extension's popup menu.
• Privacy-Focused: Processes tweet content securely, ensuring your data is handled with the utmost care.

How it works:
• Real-Time Analysis: As you browse X, the extension scans tweets displayed on your feed.
• Content Filtering: Tweets that potentially contain harmful content are blurred out.
• Warning Overlay: A warning message appears over the blurred tweet, informing you of the detected content.
• User Choice: Click on the blurred tweet if you wish to reveal its content.

Why Use CyberSafe?
• Enhance Well-being: Reduce exposure to harmful or negative content that can impact your mental health.
• Stay in Control: Customize your online experience by filtering out unwanted content.
• Promote Positivity: Encourage a healthier and more positive social media environment.

Getting Started
1. Install the Extension: Click "Add to Chrome" to install the Cyberbullying Detector.
2. Pin the Extension: For quick access, pin the extension to your browser toolbar.
3. Browse as Usual: Navigate to X.com and enjoy a safer browsing experience.
4. Manage Settings: Use the extension's popup menu to enable or disable the blurring feature at any time.

Permissions Required
Access to X.com: The extension needs permission to read tweet content on X to analyze and modify it for blurring purposes.

Privacy Policy
Your privacy is important to us. CyberSafe does not store or share your personal data. All processing is done securely to provide you with real-time content filtering without compromising your privacy.

Support and Feedback
We value your feedback! If you have any questions, issues, or suggestions, please contact us at thesisgrp9.cs302@gmail.com. Or fill out this form: https://forms.gle/AkxZG6J94FEbQQfT6

Disclaimers
Accuracy: While CyberSafe uses advanced algorithms, it may not catch all instances of harmful content or may occasionally blur content that is not offensive. We recommend exercising discretion when viewing blurred tweets.

Affiliation: This extension is an independent project and is not affiliated with or endorsed by X Corp (Twitter).
